response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which I believe is a perfect match for your needs and aspirations. This product holds immense value for me, but its true worth lies in the hands of someone who can appreciate it fully. Given its significance and the impact it can have on your endeavors, I am offering you the chance to own it at a special price.

Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I propose a price of $1,200,000 for this product. I am confident that this investment will not only meet but exceed your expectations, providing substantial returns and value over time.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about the product. I am here to provide you with all the information you need to make an informed decision.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
